name: Cleartronic, Inc.
overview:
Cleartronic, Inc. (Cleartronic) designs, builds and installs unified group communication solutions, including hardware and customized software, for public and private enterprises and markets those services and products under the VoiceInterop brand name.

VoiceInterop, Inc. is the operating subsidiary of the Company. The Company is developing an Application Service Provider hosted solution for voice interoperability for enterprise level customers and is continuing to develop a line of Internet protocol (IP) gateway devices and AM360 device.

The products used in its solutions include its own products, as well as products from other software and hardware vendors. The component of its unified group communication solution is WAVE software developed by Twisted Pair Solutions, Inc.

relationships.title: CEO & Chairman of the Board of Directors
